text: is a Japanese former cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit event at the 1984 Summer Olympics and 1982 Asian Games. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Japan Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Iwate Prefecture Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:Cyclists at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1982 Asian Games
title: Mitsugu Sarudate
